scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run frontend:build && python build.py
scripts.clean: node -e "['build', 'gui'].forEach(d => { try { require('fs').rmSync(d, { recursive: true, force: true }); } catch (e) { if (e.code !== 'ENOTEMPTY') throw e; } });"
scripts.backend: cross-env-shell "${PROFILE:+uv run scalene}${PROFILE:-uv run python -m jurigged} backend/src/app.py"
scripts.init: uv venv && uv pip install -r requirements.txt && bun i
scripts.start: bun run check:frontend && concurrently --raw --kill-others --success first --names "frontend,backend" "bun run frontend:dev" "bun run backend"
scripts.check: bun run check:frontend && bun run check:backend
scripts.check:frontend: bunx biome check --write frontend && bun run tsc --noEmit
scripts.test: bun run test:frontend && bun run test:backend:coverage
scripts.test:backend:coverage: PYTHONPATH=backend/src:. ./venv/bin/python -m coverage run -m unittest discover -s backend/tests -p '*.py' -t . && ./venv/bin/python -m coverage report && ./venv/bin/python -m coverage html
